name: FoodMap
tagline: FoodMap.asia is a startup that aims to connect customers directly to ethical farmers and food producers.
description:
FoodMap.asia is a startup that aims to connect customers directly to ethical farmers and food producers. We do that by working closely with farmers, inspecting their farms and make sure they align with our standard. After that, we launch a campaign to introduce their farms to the public and attract final customers as well as retailers to pre-order the products.
- Foodmap.asia - Best Foodtech or Agritech Startup 2019 by Asean Rice Bowl Startup Awards
- Foodmap.asia - Award for Most Impactful Innovation at ASIA Innovates 2019 by NewtonFund, Royal Academy Of Engineering
